info.description: Deletes the relationship between a customer and a team, removing team-based access and management
info.title: Customer API

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all customer records with optional team filtering

parameters.description: The API key for the request to gain access the Azure API Management gateway
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

parameters.description: The deployment location of the request to identify the location of the deployed resources (e.g. za0)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Deployment-Location

parameters.description: The application ID of the request to identify the tenant (e.g. mppdemo)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-ID

parameters.description: The type of application making the request to determine the expected response (e.g. mypetparlorapp)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: The Firebase ID token of the user making the request used to authenticate and authorise the request
parameters.name: firebaseIdToken

parameters.description: The page number to retrieve
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Used to determine if pagination is applied to the results. If true, the results will be paginated. If false, the results will not be paginated and all results will be returned.
parameters.name: paginate

parameters.description: Used to filter customers based on being associated with the provided team ID
parameters.name: teamId

parameters.description: Used to filter customers based on being associated with any of the provided team IDs (comma separated list of team IDs)
parameters.name: teamIds

post.description: Creates a new customer record with provided details, optionally sending an invitation email and linking to Xero

parameters.description: The API key for the request to gain access the Azure API Management gateway
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

parameters.description: The deployment location of the request to identify the location of the deployed resources (e.g. za0)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Deployment-Location

parameters.description: The application ID of the request to identify the tenant (e.g. mppdemo)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-ID

parameters.description: The type of application making the request to determine the expected response (e.g. mypetparlorapp)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: The Firebase ID token of the user making the request used to authenticate and authorise the request
parameters.name: firebaseIdToken

parameters.description: Optionally send an invite to the customer via email after creation
parameters.name: sendInvite

parameters.description: Used to associate the new customer with a team
parameters.name: teamId

parameters.description: Optionally specify the xero tenant ID to create a contact in Xero for the customer
parameters.name: xeroTenantId

requestBody.description: JSON body to create a customer resource

get.description: Performs a text-based search across all customer records with pagination and optional team filtering

parameters.description: The API key for the request to gain access the Azure API Management gateway
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

parameters.description: The deployment location of the request to identify the location of the deployed resources (e.g. za0)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Deployment-Location

parameters.description: The application ID of the request to identify the tenant (e.g. mppdemo)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-ID

parameters.description: The type of application making the request to determine the expected response (e.g. mypetparlorapp)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: The Firebase ID token of the user making the request used to authenticate and authorise the request
parameters.name: firebaseIdToken

parameters.description: The page number to retrieve
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: The number of items to retrieve per page
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: Used to determine if pagination is applied to the results. If true, the results will be paginated. If false, the results will not be paginated and all results will be returned.
parameters.name: paginate

parameters.description: Used to filter customers based on a search query (e.g. 'John')
parameters.name: query

parameters.description: Used to filter customers based on being associated with the provided team ID
parameters.name: teamId

parameters.description: Used to filter customers based on being associated with any of the provided team IDs (comma separated list of team IDs)
parameters.name: teamIds

get.description: Retrieves detailed information for a specific customer by their unique identifier (UID) instead of ID

parameters.description: The API key for the request to gain access the Azure API Management gateway
parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

parameters.description: The deployment location of the request to identify the location of the deployed resources (e.g. za0)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Deployment-Location

parameters.description: The application ID of the request to identify the tenant (e.g. mppdemo)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-ID

parameters.description: The type of application making the request to determine the expected response (e.g. mypetparlorapp)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: The Firebase ID token of the user making the request used to authenticate and authorise the request
parameters.name: firebaseIdToken

parameters.description: Unique name of the customer resource
parameters.name: uid

get.summary: Get single customer resource by its unique name

delete.description: Permanently removes a customer record from the system by their unique ID

parameters.name: Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key

parameters.description: The deployment location of the request to identify the location of the deployed resources (e.g. za0)

parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-ID

parameters.description: The type of application making the request to determine the expected response (e.g. mypetparlorapp)
parameters.name: X-MBA-Application-Type

parameters.description: The Firebase ID token of the user making the request used to authenticate and authorise the request
parameters.name: firebaseIdToken

parameters.description: ID of the customer
parameters.name: id
